meanings.definition: Belonging to or characteristic of hereditarians.
meanings.sent1: The hereditarians traits were passed down through generations.
meanings.sent2: The researchers studied the hereditarians characteristics in the family.
meanings.sent3: The hereditarians features made them stand out at the family reunion.
meanings.sent4: The hereditarians influence could be seen in every aspect of their lives.
meanings.sent5: The hereditarians nature of the family was evident in their shared traits.

meanings.definition: A person who believes in or advocates for hereditarianism.
meanings.sent1: The hereditarians were vocal about their beliefs in genetic inheritance.
meanings.sent2: She was known as a hereditarians due to her strong support for genetic theories.
meanings.sent3: The hereditarians at the conference debated passionately about genetic influences.
meanings.sent4: He stood out as a hereditarians among his peers for his unwavering beliefs.
meanings.sent5: The hereditarians' influence in the field of genetics was widely recognized.
